=========
Changelog
=========

Here's the recent changes to Ordered Set.

.. changelog::
    :version: 1.1.2
    :released: 2014-10-02

    .. change::
        :tags: general

        Make comparisons work with sets and lists,
        and not crash when compared with None.

.. changelog::
    :version: 1.1.1
    :released: 2014-08-24

    .. change::
        :tags: general

        Add pickle/copy support to OrderedSet.

.. changelog::
    :version: 1.1
    :released: 2014-06-04

    .. change::
        :tags: general

        Make OrderedSets handle slicing in __getitem__().

.. changelog::
    :version: 1.0.2
    :released: 2014-05-14

    .. change::
        :tags: docs

        Add proper attribution and licenses.

.. changelog::
    :version: 1.0.1
    :released: 2014-05-13

    .. change::
        :tags: build

        Don't require Cython to build an sdist.

.. changelog::
    :version: 1.0
    :released: 2014-05-11

    .. change::
        :tags: general

        First implementation.
